name: Moonlit Walk
description:
Moonlit Walk

As you and your team venture on the lunar surface, you find yourself far from your home base. Follow your lights back to the base, and hope nothing bad happens...

Hey everyone! This is my first game proper game I have made! Its less of a game and more of a concept I had, and my attempt at learing the Unity Engine, I hope to continue making games in it!

I have never used unity before so there may be some issues, but I hope you "enjoy" this horrible game I made in about 3 days! It was fun to make!
